idea-plugin.name: AceJump
idea-plugin.description:
AceJump allows you to quickly navigate the cursor to any position visible in the editor. See a demo in action here: http://johnlindquist.com/2012/08/14/ace_jump.html
Simply hit "ctrl+;", type a character, then type the matching character to Ace Jump.
idea-plugin.change-notes: <html> <dl> <dt>1.0.3</dt> <dd>Fixed minor visual lag when removing the "jumpers" from the editor<dd> <dt>1.0.2</dt> <dd>Cleaning up minor bugs (npe when editor not in focus, not removing layers)<dd> <dt>1.0.1</dt> <dd>Adding a new jump: "Enter" will take you to the first non-whitespace char in a new line (compare to "Home" which takes you to a new line)</dd> <dt>1.0</dt> <dd>Cleaned up code base for release</dd> </dl> </html>
